QuestData.Title: Marley's Final Flight
QuestData.Description: Okay, $n! Let's take these artifacts to my father and give him our report firsthand.$B$BThanks to your help my flying machine is ready to roll. We can fly there together and share in the glory.$B$BTalk to me when you're all set to move out!
QuestData.LogDescription: Talk to Marley Twinbraid and take a spin in his flying machine.
QuestData.RewardText: <The battered dwarf hangs limply from the cockpit. As you approach the burning wreckage, his eyes flutter open.>$B$B<Marley Twinbraid is still alive!>
